channel.title: Charisma - A new adventure
channel.description:
[CENTER]
I'd like to say a big thank you to the whole server! We are growing slowly but surely and it's inspiring me to keep coding more and more, so far, It's been a great adventure and I'm learning more everyday and this is just the start. The community is amazing and the best I could ask for, without a doubt I feel I've not just created a server, I've created a community and string of people who never fail to inspire me!
[IMG]http://s14.postimg.org/h92pt5r8v/ADVER3.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/5tuon8.png[/img] [B]Download Our Client:[/B] [URL=http://"https://www.dropbox.com/s/snuzx3um9rp0az0/Charisma.jar?dl=0"]Charisma[/URL]
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2qajsjb.gif[/img] [B]Website:[/B] [URL=http://"http://charismaonline.co.uk/"]Charisma[/URL]
[video=youtube;nUUvSmC7Svw]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nUUvSmC7Svw[/video]
[SPOILER=Details and other images][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/o7gaT4O.png[/img]
For the past few months I've been working on a server that lived about 1-2 years ago, I was the Co-Owner and Coder of the server until it was abandoned by the owner. We started off as a server hosted on a my friends computer and a free webhost but now we're on a full VPS and paid hosting!
I'll add a few screenshots and a list below but I hope to see you on and meeting you, Thanks. Features: [B]Perfect[/B] Community [B]Bounty Hunter[/B] [B]Elite Slayer Tasks[/B] [B]Fullscreen[/B] Client! Full [B]working skills[/B] including[B] Hunter[/B], [B]Dungeoneering[/B] and [B]Summoning[/B]! [B]Achievements[/B] and [B]Quests[/B] to do [B]Quick Prayer[/B] Full [B]Godwars[/B] and [B]Nex[/B] Working [B]Vengance[/B] Loads of [B]training spots[/B]. New perfect[B] Hybriding[/B] system. Full functioning [B]Clan Chat[/B] Loads of shops but with a great [B]economy[/B]. [B]9[/B] Bosses [B]Custom[/B] Minigames
[B]Choose from a difficulty:[/B] Easy Medium Hard Legend
[B]Minigames[/B] Assault Fight Caves Pest Control Barrows Duel Arena (Few more Customs ready to be added)
[SPOILER=Screenshots][IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/3104044/Uten_navn12.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/3102844/Uten_navn3.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/3102887/Uten_navn10.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/3102832/Uten_navn.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/3102856/Uten_navn7.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/3102851/Uten_navn9.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/3102890/Uten_navn5.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/3102853/Uten_navn1.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/3102855/Uten_navn4.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/3103998/Uten_navn11.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/3104066/Uten_navn14.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/3102859/Uten_navn2.png[/img][/SPOILER][/SPOILER]
[/CENTER]

item.title: Charisma - A new adventure
item.dc:creator: @king_joshied king joshied
item.description:
@king_joshied wrote:

[CENTER]

I’d like to say a big thank you to the whole server! We are growing slowly but surely and it’s inspiring me to keep coding more and more, so far, It’s been a great adventure and I’m learning more everyday and this is just the start. The community is amazing and the best I could ask for, without a doubt I feel I’ve not just created a server, I’ve created a community and string of people who never fail to inspire me!

[B]Download Our Client:[/B] [URL=http://“https://www.dropbox.com/s/snuzx3um9rp0az0/Charisma.jar?dl=0”]Charisma[/URL]

[B]Website:[/B] [URL=http://“http://charismaonline.co.uk/”]Charisma[/URL]

[video=youtube;nUUvSmC7Svw]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nUUvSmC7Svw[/video]

[SPOILER=Details and other images]

For the past few months I’ve been working on a server that lived about 1-2 years ago, I was the Co-Owner and Coder of the server until it was abandoned by the owner. We started off as a server hosted on a my friends computer and a free webhost but now we’re on a full VPS and paid hosting!

I’ll add a few screenshots and a list below but I hope to see you on and meeting you, Thanks.
Features:
[B]Perfect[/B] Community
[B]Bounty Hunter[/B]
[B]Elite Slayer Tasks[/B]
[B]Fullscreen[/B] Client!
Full [B]working skills[/B] including[B] Hunter[/B], [B]Dungeoneering[/B] and [B]Summoning[/B]!
[B]Achievements[/B] and [B]Quests[/B] to do
[B]Quick Prayer[/B]
Full [B]Godwars[/B] and [B]Nex[/B]
Working [B]Vengance[/B]
Loads of [B]training spots[/B].
New perfect[B] Hybriding[/B] system.
Full functioning [B]Clan Chat[/B]
Loads of shops but with a great [B]economy[/B].
[B]9[/B] Bosses
[B]Custom[/B] Minigames

[B]Choose from a difficulty:[/B]
Easy
Medium
Hard
Legend

[B]Minigames[/B]
Assault
Fight Caves
Pest Control
Barrows
Duel Arena
(Few more Customs ready to be added)

[SPOILER=Screenshots]










[/SPOILER][/SPOILER]

[/CENTER]
